statements: SELECT * FROM Itinerary;
SELECT location, timing FROM Itinerary;
SELECT * FROM Itinerary WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Itinerary WHERE timing > '2022-01-01';
SELECT itinerary_id, location, timing FROM Itinerary ORDER BY timing DESC;
SELECT * FROM Itinerary WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY timing DESC
SELECT * FROM Itinerary WHERE timing >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND timing <= '2022-12-31 23:59:59'
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM Itinerary GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_count DESC
SELECT * FROM Itinerary ORDER BY timing ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM Itinerary
SELECT * FROM Itinerary;
SELECT start_date, end_date FROM Itinerary ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT itinerary_id, start_date, end_date FROM Itinerary WHERE itinerary_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Sightseeing WHERE location_name = 'Museum';
SELECT location_name, time_of_visit FROM Sightseeing ORDER BY time_of_visit ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sightseeing;
SELECT itinerary_id, location_name, time_of_visit FROM Sightseeing WHERE location_name = 'Eiffel Tower';
SELECT start_date, end_date FROM Itinerary WHERE itinerary_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Sightseeing ORDER BY location_name ASC, time_of_visit DESC;
SELECT S.location_name, I.start_date FROM Sightseeing AS S INNER JOIN Itinerary AS I ON S.itinerary_id = I.itinerary_id;
SELECT * FROM ItineraryDetails;
SELECT id, itinerary_name, start_date, end_date FROM ItineraryDetails WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location_name FROM SightseeingLocations WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ItineraryTimings WHERE start_time > '12:00:00';
SELECT itinerary_name, start_date, location_name, start_time FROM ItineraryDetails d JOIN ItineraryTimings t ON d.id = t.itinerary_id JOIN SightseeingLocations l ON t.location_id = l.id;
SELECT * FROM ItineraryDetails WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, location_description FROM SightseeingLocations WHERE location_name LIKE '%beach%' ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT id, itinerary_name, start_date, end_date FROM ItineraryDetails WHERE id IN (SELECT itinerary_id FROM ItineraryTimings WHERE start_time BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '12:00:00');
SELECT * FROM ItineraryTimings LEFT JOIN SightseeingLocations ON ItineraryTimings.location_id = SightseeingLocations.id WHERE end_time > '15:00:00';

SELECT ItineraryDetails.itinerary_name, SightseeingLocations.location_name, ItineraryTimings.start_time, ItineraryTimings.end_time FROM ItineraryDetails INNER JOIN ItineraryTimings ON ItineraryDetails.id = ItineraryTimings.itinerary_id INNER JOIN SightseeingLocations ON ItineraryTimings.location_id = SightseeingLocations.id ORDER BY itinerary_name DESC, location_name ASC, start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM SightseeingLocations;
SELECT location_name, address FROM SightseeingLocations WHERE opening_hours = '9:00 am - 5:00 pm';
SELECT sightseeing_id, location_name FROM SightseeingLocations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ItineraryDetails WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT itinerary_name, start_date, end_date FROM ItineraryDetails ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, address FROM SightseeingLocations;
SELECT itinerary_name, start_date, end_date FROM ItineraryDetails WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, address, opening_hours FROM SightseeingLocations WHERE opening_hours LIKE '%09:00%' ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT itinerary_name, start_date, end_date FROM ItineraryDetails WHERE end_date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT location_name, address, time_schedule FROM SightseeingLocations INNER JOIN SightseeingTimings ON SightseeingLocations.sightseeing_id = SightseeingTimings.sightseeing_id ORDER BY time_schedule ASC;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT itinerary_name, start_date, end_date FROM Itinerary;
SELECT city, country, location_name FROM SightseeingLocations;
SELECT * FROM ItinerarySightseeing;
SELECT username, email FROM Users;
SELECT * FROM Itinerary;
SELECT itinerary_name, start_date, end_date FROM Itinerary WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM SightseeingLocations WHERE city = 'Paris';

SELECT itinerary_name, start_date, end_date, location_name, city, country FROM Itinerary INNER JOIN ItinerarySightseeing ON Itinerary.itinerary_id = ItinerarySightseeing.itinerary_id INNER JOIN SightseeingLocations ON ItinerarySightseeing.location_id = SightseeingLocations.location_id;

SELECT u.username, i.itinerary_name, s.location_name, t.start_time, t.end_time FROM Users u INNER JOIN Itinerary i ON u.user_id = i.user_id INNER JOIN ItinerarySightseeing is ON i.itinerary_id = is.itinerary_id INNER JOIN SightseeingLocations s ON is.location_id = s.location_id INNER JOIN Timings t ON is.timing_id = t.timing_id;
